title: Péktheon
body:
What the bread  did you just breading say about me, you little bread ? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class on Mount Targon  and I’ve been involved in numerous secret baking contests on Runeterra, and I have over 300 confirmed bakes. I am trained in jumping very high and I’m the top  Artisan of War  in the entire Targon Bakery. You are nothing to me but just another sack of flour. I will wipe you the bread out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on Runeterra, mark my words. You think you can get away with saying that Pék Pantheon is the better name to me over the Internet? Think again, bread . As we speak I am contacting my secret network of bakers across Runeterra and your RP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your bakery. You’re  baked, kid. I can land from anywhere, anytime, and I can bake you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my spear. Not only am I extensively trained in baking, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the Mount Targon Bakery and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable bread off the face of the continent, you little bread. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your breading tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn bread. I will bake bread all over you and you will drown in it. You’re breading baked, kiddo.

{{champion:80}} **IGAZSÁGOT PÉKTHEONNAK**{{champion:80}}

replies.body: Kérem valaki lefordítaná ezt magyarra? Nem tudok jól angolul :S
Igazából csak kicserélt random főneveket az angol "bread", azaz "kenyér" szóra.
Igazából ez egy nagyon régi és remek meme, a [Navy Seal Copypasta](http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/navy-seal-copypasta).

Káromkodást cenzúráztam a breaddel, és egyéb szavakat is kicseréltem :v

{{champion:80}} **IGAZSÁGOT PÉKTHEONNAK**{{champion:80}}
